text: @realDonaldTrump @PressSec If USA had South Korean leader instead of incompetent Trump we would have about 1800 Covid19 (300 X 6) deaths instead of over 90,000. South Korea got their first case of Covid19 same day as USA. They tested/traced/isolated immediately. They have less than 300 deaths@1/6 our size
